nodes.text: The siege at Onderon took place on the Inner Rim planet of Onderon during the Outer Rim Sieges in 19 BBY, towards the end of the galactic conflict fought between the Galactic Republic and Confederacy of Independent Systems that was the Clone Wars. Saw Gerrera, a native of Onderon who had helped lead the anti-Separatist rebels in the previous Onderonian Civil War, fought in the siege in the Republic's interest like he had during the Civil War.

During the Battle of Yerbana, when former Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano and Mandalorian Bo-Katan Kryze contacted the Republic using Jedi General Anakin Skywalker's Fulcrum frequency, Generals Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi initially thought Gerrera was trying to contact them, with the latter speculating that the siege had taken a negative turn. However, Admiral Wullf Yularen informed the Jedi it was not Gerrera contacting them, and the two soon learned that it was instead Tano and Kryze.
The siege at Onderon was mentioned in "Old Friends Not Forgotten," the ninth episode of the seventh and final season of Star Wars: The Clone Wars, which was released on April 17, 2020.
